examples.korean: A new late-night service is now operating. 발음듣기 새로운 심야 서비스가 지금 운용되고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: We operate an open-door policy here, and are always willing to listen to our students’ suggestions. 발음듣기 우리는 의사소통 장려 정책을 운용하며 항상 학생들의 제안에 기꺼이 귀를 기울입니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We operate an open-door policy here, and are always willing to listen to our students’ suggestions. 발음

examples.korean: The regulation operates in favour of married couples. 발음듣기 그 규정은 기혼 부부들에게 유리하게 운용된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The regulation operates in favour of married couples. 발음
